name: ICE Breakers
description:
Can you break the ICE of the corporations who are hiding their dark secrets?
How deep will you delve?

A hacking roguelite game, in the theme of duskers, where you are able to directly control your character, or type movement commands into the console like programming.

Everything happens in beat with the music, and the music changes based on the game state. All music made by me except one track made by the-simian (plays on return to the menu.)

Move around using WASD, rotate the camera with QE, or hit ~ or ` and use the console to give commands to the "daemon" named todd.
